bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Alternative Names xu ming 虛鳴.

Illness Sign of rattling sounds in the intestines brought forth by stagnating water in the abdomen. Yao xing lun 藥性論 Substance Entry hou pu 厚朴：能主療積年冷氣，腹內雷鳴虛吼，宿食不 消，除痰飲，去結水 , “It is able to cure cold qi that has accumulated over years, thunderous rumbles and depletion roar in the abdomen, with food that remains in the body overnight and fails to dissolve, and eliminates phlegm rheum, as well as bound water”.
